mapper.sql: A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO, A.DDL_REL_PNM, A.PA_ENTY_PNM, A.PA_ATTR_PNM, A.CH_ENTY_PNM, A.CH_ATTR_PNM, A.DDL_REL_ID, A.DDL_REL_LNM, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.RQST_DCD, A.REL_TYP_CD, A.CRD_TYP_CD, A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.PA_SUBJ_PNM, A.PA_ENTY_ID, A.PA_ATTR_ID, A.CH_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_SUBJ_PNM, A.CH_ENTY_ID, A.CH_ATTR_ID, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, DDL_REL_PNM, PA_ENTY_PNM, PA_ATTR_PNM, CH_ENTY_PNM, CH_ATTR_PNM, DDL_REL_ID, DDL_REL_LNM, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, RQST_DCD, REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_SUBJ_PNM, PA_ENTY_ID, PA_ATTR_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_SUBJ_PNM, CH_ENTY_ID, CH_ATTR_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ddlRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
RQST_DTL_SNO,
DDL_REL_PNM,
PA_ENTY_PNM,
PA_ATTR_PNM,
CH_ENTY_PNM,
CH_ATTR_PNM,
DDL_REL_ID,
DDL_REL_LNM,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
RQST_DCD,
REL_TYP_CD,
CRD_TYP_CD,
PA_OPT_TYP_CD,
PA_SUBJ_ID,
PA_SUBJ_PNM,
PA_ENTY_ID,
PA_ATTR_ID,
CH_SUBJ_ID,
CH_SUBJ_PNM,
CH_ENTY_ID,
CH_ATTR_ID,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,

#{ddlRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ddlRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL
DDL_REL_ID = #{ddlRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_REL_LNM = #{ddlRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_SUBJ_PNM = #{paSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_ATTR_ID = #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_SUBJ_PNM = #{chSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_ENTY_ID = #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_ATTR_ID = #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and DDL_REL_PNM = #{ddlRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ENTY_PNM = #{paEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ATTR_PNM = #{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ENTY_PNM = #{chEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ATTR_PNM = #{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL set DDL_REL_ID = #{ddlRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_REL_LNM = #{ddlRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_SUBJ_PNM = #{paSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_ATTR_ID = #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_SUBJ_PNM = #{chSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_ENTY_ID = #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_ATTR_ID = #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and DDL_REL_PNM = #{ddlRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ENTY_PNM = #{paEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ATTR_PNM = #{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ENTY_PNM = #{chEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ATTR_PNM = #{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
--DDL 이관테이블 추가시 DDL 관계를 추가한다. INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, DDL_REL_ID, DDL_REL_PNM, DDL_REL_LNM, RQST_DCD , REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_PNM, PA_ENTY_PNM, PA_ATTR_PNM, CH_SUBJ_PNM, CH_ENTY_PNM, CH_ATTR_PNM , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT B.RQST_NO, B.RQST_SNO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.DDL_REL_ID, C.DDL_REL_PNM, C.DDL_REL_LNM, B.RQST_DCD AS RQST_DCD , C.REL_TYP_CD, C.CRD_TYP_CD, C.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PS.FULL_PATH, PE.DDL_TBL_PNM, PC.DDL_COL_PNM, CS.FULL_PATH, CE.DDL_TBL_PNM, CC.DDL_COL_PNM , C.OBJ_DESCN, C.OBJ_VERS, B.FRS_RQST_DTM, B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, SYSDATE, B.RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_DDL_TBL A INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL PP ON A.PDM_TBL_ID = PP.PDM_TBL_ID JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B ON A.DDL_TBL_PNM = B.DDL_TBL_PNM INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_REL C ON A.DDL_TBL_ID = C.CH_ENTY_ID AND PP.SUBJ_ID = C.CH_SUBJ_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = B.TGT_DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ PS ON C.PA_SUBJ_ID = PS.SUBJ_ID AND PS.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND PS.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ CS ON C.CH_SUBJ_ID = CS.SUBJ_ID AND CS.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND CS.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL PE ON C.PA_ENTY_ID = PE.DDL_TBL_ID AND PE.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL CE ON C.CH_ENTY_ID = CE.DDL_TBL_ID AND CE.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL PC ON C.PA_ATTR_ID = PC.DDL_COL_ID AND C.PA_ENTY_ID = PC.DDL_TBL_ID AND PC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL CC ON C.CH_ATTR_ID = CC.DDL_COL_ID AND C.CH_ENTY_ID = CC.DDL_TBL_ID AND CC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL A SET (A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_SUBJ_ID) = (select B.SUBJ_ID, C.SUBJ_ID from WAA_SUBJ B INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON 1=1 AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') where B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.FULL_PATH = A.PA_SUBJ_PNM AND C.FULL_PATH = A.CH_SUBJ_PNM ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL A SET (A.PA_ENTY_ID, A.PA_ATTR_ID, A.CH_ENTY_ID, A.CH_ATTR_ID) = (select B.DDL_TBL_ID, C.DDL_COL_ID, D.DDL_TBL_ID, E.DDL_COL_ID from WAM_DDL_TBL B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL D ON 1=1 AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL C ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL E ON D.DDL_TBL_ID = E.DDL_TBL_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') where B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.PA_ENTY_PNM AND C.DDL_COL_PNM = A.PA_ATTR_PNM AND D.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.CH_ENTY_PNM AND E.DDL_COL_PNM = A.CH_ATTR_PNM ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티 주제영역명 미존재 (DTR01) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.PA_SUBJ_ID IS NULL

--검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티명 미존재 (DTR02) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TBL DT INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL D ON DT.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON D.SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE DT.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.PA_ENTY_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.FULL_PATH = A.PA_SUBJ_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티 속성명 미존재 (DTR03) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TBL DT INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL DC ON DT.DDL_TBL_ID = DC.DDL_TBL_ID AND DC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL D ON DT.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL E ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = E.PDM_TBL_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ F ON D.SUBJ_ID = F.SUBJ_ID AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE DT.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.PA_ENTY_PNM AND DC.DDL_COL_PNM = A.PA_ATTR_PNM AND F.FULL_PATH = A.PA_SUBJ_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티 주제영역명 미존재 (DTR04) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CH_SUBJ_ID IS NULL

--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티명 미존재 (DTR05) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TBL DT INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL D ON DT.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON D.SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE DT.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.CH_ENTY_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.FULL_PATH = A.CH_SUBJ_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티 속성명 미존재 (DTR06) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TBL DT INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL DC ON DT.DDL_TBL_ID = DC.DDL_TBL_ID AND DC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL D ON DT.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL E ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = E.PDM_TBL_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ F ON D.SUBJ_ID = F.SUBJ_ID AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE DT.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.CH_ENTY_PNM AND DC.DDL_COL_PNM = A.CH_ATTR_PNM AND F.FULL_PATH = A.PA_SUBJ_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.update:
--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL A SET (DDL_REL_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT D.DDL_REL_ID , NVL(D.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , D.FRS_RQST_DTM , D.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL DT ON B.DDL_TBL_PNM = DT.DDL_TBL_PNM AND DT.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL C ON C.PDM_TBL_ID = DT.PDM_TBL_ID AND DT.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_REL D ON DT.DDL_TBL_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND C.SUBJ_ID = D.CH_SUBJ_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO
AND A.CH_SUBJ_ID = D.CH_SUBJ_ID AND A.CH_ENTY_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND A.DDL_REL_PNM = D.DDL_REL_PNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL DT ON B.DDL_TBL_PNM = DT.DDL_TBL_PNM AND DT.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL C ON DT.PDM_TBL_ID = C.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_REL D ON DT.DDL_TBL_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND C.SUBJ_ID = D.CH_SUBJ_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND A.CH_SUBJ_ID = D.CH_SUBJ_ID AND A.CH_ENTY_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND A.DDL_REL_PNM = D.DDL_REL_PNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... )

--주제영역 ID, 테이블 ID 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL X SET (APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) = ( SELECT SYSDATE, A.APRV_USER_ID FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL A WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능
mapper.sql: A.DDL_REL_PNM, A.DDL_REL_LNM, A.REL_TYP_CD, A.CRD_TYP_CD, A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.PA_ENTY_ID, A.PA_ATTR_ID , A.CH_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_ENTY_ID, A.CH_ATTR_ID, A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_REL A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL D ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = D.DDL_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL PD ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = PD.PDM_TBL_ID AND PD.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND D.DDL_TBL_ID = A.CH_ENTY_ID AND PD.SUBJ_ID = A.CH_SUBJ_ID AND C.DDL_REL_PNM = A.DDL_REL_PNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND C.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.insert: --WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_DDL_TSF_REL SELECT A.DDL_REL_ID , FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL A JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_DDL_TSF_REL A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.CH_SUBJ_ID = A.CH_SUBJ_ID AND C.CH_ENTY_ID = A.CH_ENTY_ID AND C.DDL_REL_PNM = A.DDL_REL_PNM AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: --WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_DDL_TSF_REL SELECT A.DDL_REL_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , SYSDATE AS STR_DTM , FROM WAQ_DDL_TSF_REL A JOIN WAQ_DDL_TSF_TBL B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
